body: Catfolk have no racial Hit Dice, gaining their capabilities from class levels. All catfolk have the following racial traits.
name: Catfolk

sections.body: Catfolk are agile and amiable, but they are known for their lack of common sense and self-control.
sections.name: +2 Dexterity, -2 Wisdom, +2 Charisma

sections.body: In dim light, catfolk can see twice as far as humans.
sections.name: Low-Light Vision

sections.body: Catfolk receive a +2 racial bonus on Perception, Stealth, and Survival checks.
sections.name: Natural Hunter

sections.body: Catfolk speak Catfolk and Common. A catfolk who has a high Intelligence score can choose from the following bonus languages: Elven, Gnoll, Gnome, Goblin, Halfling, Orc, and Sylvan.
sections.name: Languages
